title: Lucid: The First Step
description: Battling his internal issues after fighting overseas, Kevin Kelly is haunted by his memories. The quiet peaceful life style that he wants for himself is torn apart each night by the worlds his mind goes to.With recurring dreams of war, death, passion, and survival, Kevin finds himself doubting what is real or not. He struggles to push his way through the torment and come out the other side. In doing so, he gets an answer to a question that has gone unanswered for thousands of years.Will he find a reason to continue his fight or will he die in the new worlds because of the discovered truth?
author: Steven Venet
